name: BEE'S JOB
description:
BEE'S TASKS

You are a bee who need to pollinate as many flowers as possible.

In this harsh enviroment, flowers can only last a handful of seconds, so you need to be quick to succesfully repopulate this land.

HOW TO CONTROL YOUR BEE

WASD - Movement   ~ - ~ - ~   Mouse - Camera

Q - Roll Left   ~ - ~ - ~   E - Roll Right

Ctrl - Down   ~ - ~ - ~   Space - Up

Shift - Boost   ~ - ~ - ~   F - Interact

FLYING CREDITS

Design || JstPlink

Coding || JstPlink - Valerio Pirozzi
